artist: Artist: Scott Helmes; Publisher: Hermetic Press, Minneapolis
description: typed text of portion of the word "incantation" printed in seven columns; each partial word highlighted with watercolor line:  purple, orange, yellow, green, blue, red
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

verso, at bottom, typeset in black: [Fifty copies of this poem have been printed by Philip Gallo / at The Hermetic Press on BFK Rives from Font Shop Trixie. / A recording of the poem was made during the poet\'s residency / at The Atlantic Center for the Arts, June 2001.]
signed: LLC, typeset and written in black ink: [INCANTATION / for 6 voices]; LRC, typeset and written in black ink: [scott helmes / Scott Helmes]
title: Incantation for Six Voices
